description:

If any shoot will show you just how hard wiredpussy can be for some girls, this is the shoot. A tough sub may make the zapper and the sticky pads look easy, but these girls show just how intense the toys are for a new slave. Sandra starts them off slow, but quickly realizes these girls are good for nothing but sucking and fucking, so she concentrates on filling their gapping holes instead!
title: Sandra's Farm: Breaking in Jenna, Lea and Claudia
